oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #058
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The Eddy Arnold Show #58, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers (introduced as the Oklahoma Wranglers), Roy Wiggins, and host 'Pappy' Hal Horton. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers; Roy Wiggins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hal Horton) -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Eddy Arnold) -- Rose Of The Alamo (Eddy Arnold) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- Heading Down The Wrong Highway (Eddy Arnold) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold introduce the Oklahoma Wranglers -- Farther And Farther Apart (Oklahoma Wranglers) -- Eddy Arnold talks -- I Don't Love Nobody (Roy Wiggins steel guitar) -- Hal Horton and Eddy Arnold talk -- No One To Cry To (Eddy Arnold) -- Closing statement (Eddy Arnold, Hal Horton) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers; Oklahoma Wranglers (Musical group)
